body:
this old man is genius! how to keep wealth in your blood line without the incest deformity, let half siblings interbreed so their kids will havethe chance to have 100% of his genes.. 
if he has the gene AA; his kids will be AB, AC and the son has AB. the third generation will be 25% will be AA, and the rest 75% are BB with the biological sister, the half sister will give AC, BC&CB.
